Text: FREE vitamin advisor from Dr Weil todayPST The following message was sent to you as an optin subscriber to The e Direct Network We will continue to bring you valuable offers on the produc ts and services that interest you most If you wish to unsubscribe please c lick here Unsubscribe IMAGE IMAGE Take advantage of DrWeilcoms new Vitamin Advisor an interact ive feature that provides a free evaluation of the vitamins minerals and supplements your body needs in order to achieve Optimum Health Just vis it wwwdrweilvitaminadvisorcom to complete the brief Vitamin Advisor ques tionnaire Youll receive a complimentary supplement recommendation based o n your personal health and lifestyle requirements You can print out your c ustomized list of supplements for easy reference and most can be purchase d from a reputable supplier Or if you prefer to receive the Vitamin Adviso r via fax or to order your supplement recommendation by phone please call IMAGE IMAGE When you purchase your supplements di rectly through DrWeilcom youll have the advantage of receiving custom pa ckaged daily supplements which meet Dr Weils exact specifications based on your personal health profile As an added benefit when you order your supplements through wwwdrweilvitaminadvisorcom by January wel l send you a free copy of Meditation for Optimum Health a CD volume by D r Weil and Dr KabatZinn about the lifeenhancing benefits of meditation Try Dr Weils free Vitamin Advisor today and begin your journey to Op timum Health
